channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on Software Musings
channel.description: Recent content in Recent & Upcoming Talks on Software Musings

item.title: Writing Rust Commandline Applications
item.description: A talk centered on writing command line applications in Rustlang. I showcased how to write unit tests in Rust. I showed to write different types of command line applications and how to debug them using rust-lldb and more.

item.title: Containerized Golang applications with Docker and Vue.js
Containerized Golang Applications (with Vue.js)
item.description: A Modern Web Demonstration using Golang, Docker, and Vue.js Learning about how to build containerized @golang applications with @docker and @vuejs at our event tonight in the Triangle w @jbelmont80 pic.twitter.com/XtE4r1rv0a — Modern Web (@moderndotweb) July 25, 2017 There's @jbelmont80 speaking about Golang, Docker, and Vue; @ben336 talking about @gatsbyjs; and @ladyleet talking about #RxJS ! MANY here! — Rob Ocel (@robocell) July 25, 2017 Had a blast paneling with @ben336 @jbelmont80 at @moderndotweb last night!

item.title: Building a European Bakery Web Application with React.js and Node.js
Building a Web Application with React.JS and Node.JS
item.description: A Modern Web Demonstration where I show how to create a Universal Javascript Application with Node.js and React.js I also demonstrate how to utilize webpack and debug React.js applications. . @jbelmont80 showed us how to build cool things in #reactjs and #nodejs tonight at our Triangle #modernweb launch! pic.twitter.com/mu18uPtPle — Modern Web (@moderndotweb) October 25, 2016 Awesome to host this panel @modernweb_! @julemagne @tddjordan @sirhodes @thomasdcameron @macdonst @robertfischer @jbelmont80 pic.
